sentence: That message to DOJ was only amplified by committee Chair Bennie Thompson, a Mississippi Democrat, and Vice Chair Liz Cheney, a Wyoming Republican, casting the committee's probe as a struggle for the future of democracy.
title: THIS WEEK IN CONGRESS: Insulin, Legal Weed, 1/6 Contempt, Eastman Ruling & Senate Action?
